Row.Text: Here's my strategy on the Cold War: we win, they lose. - Ronald Reagan
If any city center is nuked, nuke the most city centers by the turn limit.
The only way to win is to not play.
If no city centers are nuked, have the most tanks by the turn limit.
You have the most tanks at the end of the game! You win!

The Cold War runs hot in this combat-based scenario set in the Atomic Era.
